marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Stories taken from: The thirteen problems, 1932 - The adventure of the Christmas pudding, 1960 - Miss Marple's final cases, 1979.

v. 1. The body in the library -- The moving finger -- A murder is announced -- 4.50 from Paddington. v. 2. A Caribbean mystery -- A pocket full of Rye -- The mirror cracked from side to side -- They do it with mirrors. v. 3. Nemesis -- Sleeping murder -- At Bertram's hotel -- The murder at the vicarage.

Box 1: The ABC murders -- The murder on the links -- The murder at the vicarage -- Murder is easy ; Box 2: The murder of Roger Ackroyd -- A murder is announced -- Sleeping murder -- Murder in the Mews.
